SEARCH
Module com.example.turinggame
Package JavaFxVersion.View.Util

Class Style

java.lang.Object
JavaFxVersion.View.Util.Style
public class Style extends Object
The Style class provides static methods for applying custom styles to various JavaFX components used in the application.

  • Constructor Summary

      public Style()

  • Method Details

    • setTfdStyle

      public static void setTfdStyle(javafx.scene.control.TextField tfd)
      Applies a custom style to a TextField. This style includes a filter to only accept numbers from 1 to 5 and limits input to 3 characters.
      Parameters:
      tfd - The TextField to be styled.

    • setTitleStyle

      public static void setTitleStyle(javafx.scene.control.Label title)
      Applies a custom style to a Label used as a title. This style includes font size, color, shadow effect, etc.
      Parameters:
      title - The Label to be styled.

    • setLabelStyle

      public static void setLabelStyle(javafx.scene.control.Label label)
      Applies a custom style to a Label. This style includes font size, color, font type, etc.
      Parameters:
      label - The Label to be styled.

    • setBtnStyle

      public static void setBtnStyle(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Applies a custom style to a Button. This style includes background color, text color, font size, etc.
      Parameters:
      button - The Button to be styled.

    • setPressedBtnStyle

      public static void setPressedBtnStyle(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Applies a custom style to a Button when it is pressed. This style changes text color, font size, etc.
      Parameters:
      button - The Button to be styled when pressed.

    • setScreenLblStyle

      public static void setScreenLblStyle(javafx.scene.control.Label label)
      Applies a custom style to a Label used for displaying information on the screen.
      Parameters:
      label - The Label to be styled.

    • setGuessBoxStyle

      public static void setGuessBoxStyle(javafx.scene.layout.VBox guessBox)
      Applies a custom style to a VBox used for guess display.
      Parameters:
      guessBox - The VBox to be styled.

    • setChoiceBoxStyle

      public static void setChoiceBoxStyle(javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<String> choiceBox)
      Applies a custom style to a ChoiceBox. This style includes background color, font size, rounded corners, etc.
      Parameters:
      choiceBox - The ChoiceBox to be styled.
